arts.ttl: Pisa vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Pisa and AS Roma go head-to-head in Serie A on Saturday. Both sides will search for points in what promises to be an intriguing encounter, with newly-promoted Pisa facing an established top-flight opponent at home. Pisa vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news Date: 30th August, Saturday. Kick-off: 7:45pm BST. Venue: Giuseppe Collu. Pisa Team News […] The post Pisa vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

This is Pisa's first home fame since returning to Serie A, Roma were their last opponents when they were last in Serie A in 1991. Pisa started their Serie A campaign with a 1-1 draw against Atalanta ...
